solution_line_template: Alissa folding it 3 times makes {pieces_per_fold_factor} * {pieces_per_fold_factor} * {pieces_per_fold_factor} = <<{pieces_per_fold_factor}*{pieces_per_fold_factor}*{pieces_per_fold_factor}={pieces_per_letter_paper}>>{pieces_per_letter_paper} pieces of note-size paper per letter-size paper.

So {num_letter_papers} pieces of letter-size paper make {num_letter_papers} * {pieces_per_letter_paper} = <<{num_letter_papers}*{pieces_per_letter_paper}={total_note_papers}>>{total_note_papers} pieces of note-size paper.
1 note pad would last {total_note_papers} / {notes_per_day} = <<{total_note_papers}/{notes_per_day}={notepad_duration_days}>>{notepad_duration_days} days if someone wrote {notes_per_day} notes a day.
